websiteSingleton.footerCtaTitle: Join the new Society of Raiders
websiteSingleton.footerCtaDescription: Sign up to join our Society of Raiders and receive monthly newsletters & exclusive rewards. Adventure is calling!
websiteSingleton.nonFooterCtaDescription: Are you ready to join the Society of Raiders? Sign-up to be the first to hear breaking news regarding the Tomb Raider franchise — including rewards, merchandise, and more!
websiteSingleton.minigamePuzzleTitle: Decrypt the cipher and your curiosity will be rewarded.
websiteSingleton.minigamePuzzleMissingRelicsSubtitle: Your path to discovery is still incomplete - Collect all five relics and return to the vault.
websiteSingleton.minigameRelicTrayPuzzleOpenClickPrompt: Click each relic to take a closer look
websiteSingleton.minigamePuzzleIncorrectText: Try again. The runes must be in order and the relics hold the clues...
websiteSingleton.minigameCorrectSolutionSubtitle: You've solved an ancient puzzle and unlocked the vault. Your avatar awaits!
websiteSingleton.minigameSolvedLoggedOutCta: Become a Raider! Sign up for breaking news, rewards, exclusives, merch, releases, and more!
websiteSingleton.minigameFirePrompt: A Raider's path to discovery starts with a spark.
websiteSingleton.minigameFireHint: Seek out the relics to unlock the vault.
websiteSingleton.minigamePuzzleSkipExplanationText: You are about to auto-complete the puzzle. Are you sure you want to do this?
websiteSingleton.registrationDisplayNameHelperText: Become a Tomb Raider today by signing up with a Display Name! Your Display Name will be used for future site features & engagement opportunities. Adventure awaits – will you answer the call?

content.value: and I acknowledge that I have read and understand Crystal Dynamic's

websiteSingleton.resetPasswordDescription: Are you ready to become a Tomb Raider? Sign-up to be the first to hear breaking news regarding the Tomb Raider franchise — including rewards, exclusives, merch, releases, and more!
websiteSingleton.loginFormWelcomeDescription: Log in to access and update your account information.
websiteSingleton.minigameSolvedLoggedInPromptDescription: Keep an eye on your dashboard for breaking news, rewards, and exclusive content.

surveys.title: Tomb Raider Survey
surveys.description:
Please answer a few questions so we can get to know you better. 

For completing this survey you will be rewards with a new profile Avatar.

fields.questionText: Would you like to sign up to potentially playtest future product?
What is the highest level of education you have completed?
How many games a year do you purchase?

signUpBanner.message: Join the Society of Raiders to stay up to date with the latest Tomb Raider news
